title: DARK SOULS REMASTERED
notes:
IN ORDER TO TO RUN THIS GAME YOU NEED TO INSTALL VC2017
WINEPREFIX=/home/<your user>/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/570940/pfx winetricks

- Select "Select the default wineprefix" and then "Install a Windows DLL or component".

- Select "vcrun2017" and click Ok.

title: Dark Souls Remastered
notes:
Added vcrun2017 via wineprefix+winetrick. 
creating new char only work if offline. 
Mouse doest not have 360ª camera.

title: Dark Souls Remastered
notes: 60 fps with few drops.

title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
notes: After I installed vcrun2017 in WINEPREFIX=$HOME/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/570940/pfx/ with winetricks it works. Framerate wasn't great, so I had to disable VSync to prevent it from running at half speed all the time. Otherwise no issues.

title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
notes: Didn't matter which version of Proton was used, the game would open up a window then immediately close (crash), wouldn't even reach the main title screen.
protonVersion: tried default as well as 3.7-3 & 3.7-4, nothing worked

title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
notes: Closes after launch

title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
notes: Works fine (slip second freezes only once in a while, not much) Crashes to desktop when quitting game back to main menu. No issues with vsync and all settings turned on and TAA work with no issues to performance

title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
notes: Massive graphic glitches like green textures and wrong geometry drawn, looks like something is wrong in the rendering and the game doesn't really look playable while like this

Seems to run perfectly for several hours, with only the occasional crash on quitting. I ran into some graphical glitches in Blighttown. That area is notoriously bad for its effects and low framerate, on all platforms.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

notes: Did the vc2017 install using winetricks as detailed in the below responses and the game works without any issues. However, it crashes when starting a game with new character as well as crashes when returning to the main menu.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

notes: Game only works after installation of vcrun2017. Runs fine (60 fps) with old saves, but crashes after character creation.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon HD 7800 Series (PITCAIRN, DRM 3.26.0 AMD 18.30 , 4.15.0-30-generic, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Runs well after installing vc2017, but playable only in windowed mode, in fullscreen mouse has about 120 degree camera lock, so you can only look in one direction. DE is Gnome. If you find a fix -- be sure to post it here.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

notes: Game was crashing on startup, fixed by installing vcrun2017 through winetricks and updating graphics drivers. Game is playable however on my system the audio becomes distorted after a certain amount of time playing, only way to fix is to restart the game. Game crashes when returning to main menu. Otherwise performance is fine.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

notes: After installing vcrun2017 it runs great, with a couple exceptions. It will crash to the desktop when creating a new character or quitting to   the main menu more often than not, and there are huge flashing graphical glitches that are slightly annoying in the Depths and nearly game-breaking in Blighttown, but they never appear anywhere else in the game.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon R9 200 Series (HAWAII, DRM 3.19.0, 4.14.72-1-lts, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes:
Required the installation of vcrun2017, once installed the game runs at full speed with no visual errors. Can crash on returning to menu (happened 1/20 times).
Note that I only tested some areas (Firelink, Burg, Parish, Blighttown, Lost Izalith) with the use of my original Windows save/settings.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED

notes: Game crashed at launch until I used winetricks to install vcrun2017 as others have done, and was able to play a character I'd created on windows, however game would crash on returning to main menu or creating a new character. I fixed this by using winetricks to also install binkw32 (RAD Game Tools binkw32.dll) - new character was now playable (!!!), intro movie played, I played up to Lordran then quit to main menu without crashing. Continued game then a few seconds later quit to main menu again, and it crashed.
title: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
